idea:
SalesClap is a powerful cloud based software-as-a-service (SaaS) CRM provider in India. It is SaaS CRM tool that makes sales predictable. It stores customers information like names, addresses, email, phone numbers etc… as well as keeps track of your sales activities, it's the definitive tool for scaling businesses.

It is running entirely on air so there is no expensive setup cost and it is maintenance-free. Your employees can operate this from anywhere or from any device with an internet connection, you just need to login and start using this software application and manage your customers as simple as that.
name: SALESCLAP IT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: SABBA CARE AND HYGIENE PRIVATE LIMITED  “SABBA” mean’s whole and we started with a motto to provide complete care and hygiene for women during those leak day’s. We are a team with experience professionals in the field of Sanitary Napkins. Sabba Care and Hygiene aims to offer best Organic & Ecofriendly product at reasonable price, accessible for every women in India. As most of the sanitary napkins available in the market at reasonable cost are made up of plastic which is harmful for human bodies…..at the same time Organic and eco-friendly product are available with very high price tag. Not every woman can afford these.
name: SABBA CARE AND HYGIENE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Dear Sir/ Madam,

It’s my pleasure to share with you my latest innovation in the field of ayurveda, which was due for a long time.

Through this humble initiative, I'm trying to add value to our rich heritage and wisdom of Ayurveda combining with digitalization and AI technology.
We all spend a lot of time in the corporate world which provides us with achievements and success, but during the process sometimes we encounter health issues like blood pressure , diabetes , high cholesterol levels etc.

Through this initiative, our objective is to bring health to the corporate world which in turn will enhance productivity. Our ayurveda herbs vending machine equipped with AI technology features with over 300 different herbs diligently chosen with regards to your health and well being.
Culturally ,We cannot replace TEA & COFFEE, but surely a small lifestyle change with HERBS can help us provide better lifestyle & more productive lives by preventing grave illnesses.

Where can we install the machine??
It can be installed in corporates , gymnasiums, yoga studios, @home ,department stores and retail counters etc.
Lastly, I will be more than happy if ,my innovation can contribute towards promoting and imbibing this beautiful philosophy of ayurveda at a global platform.
Thanks!!!
Chiranjeev
name: Indias first Ayurveda vending machine equipped with Artificial Intelliegence dispensing 50+ herbs

idea: Ashvi Biotech want to produce natural Astaxanthin, which is one of the most powerful and expensive antioxidants. It has several beneficial effects on humans and fish. Astaxanthin is the crucial ingredient that supplies dietary carotenoid antioxidants to the farmed fish and shrimp with they require for their health and reddish colour.
name: Ashvi Biotech
